body:
# Confirm your email address

Form: [% service#name %]

Use this link to confirm your email address and save your work:

[Confirm your email address]([% fqdn:return.setup.email.token token='{token}' %])

Use this link within [% module.savereturn.config#emailTokenDuration %] hours or your work will be lost.

## Add your mobile for extra security

If someone else has access to your email, you can make your form more secure using your mobile phone. Youâ€™ll be able to do this after confirming your email address.[% email.auto-generated %]
subject: [% service#name %]: Confirm your email address
